feature.label: PREESM Rapid Prototyping Tool
feature.description: PREESM provides a complete framework for fast prototyping. PREESM stands for Parallel & Real-time Embedded Executives Scheduling Method. It generates a simulation and an optimized multiprocessor code from graph descriptions of algorithm and architecture.
feature.copyright: Copyright or © or Copr. IETR/INSA: Matthieu Wipliez, Jonathan Piat, Maxime Pelcat, Peng Cheng Mu, Jean-François Nezan, Mickaël Raulet [mwipliez,jpiat,mpelcat,pmu,jnezan,mraulet]@insa-rennes.fr
